what're you burning? if it's data or an ISO, use the file manager's built-in burner
Where would I find this built-in burner?
in Ubuntu's file manager, right-click on your ISO file, select the "Burn To Disc" option - done!
more info here, if you need it: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/BurningIsoHowto
